plot: When an engineer is laid off, he decides to employ his talents manufacturing inventions in his basement, much to the dismay of his family and friends.
title: Koska and His Family
plot_es: When an engineer is laid off, he decides to employ his talents manufacturing inventions in his basement, much to the dismay of his family and friends.
plot_en: When an engineer is laid off, he decides to employ his talents manufacturing inventions in his basement, much to the dismay of his family and friends.
